import React from 'react'; import { useQuery } from '@apollo/react-hooks'; import { ALL_USERS } from './friends.query'; import { CURRENT_USER } from '../navbar/authModule/auth_module_query'; function FriendsList() { const { data: all } = useQuery(ALL_USERS) const { data } = useQuery(CURRENT_USER); return (

Connections

Other users

{ all?.users?.map((user: any) =>
{user.name}
) }

Your connections

{ data?.currentUser?.friends.map((user: any) =>
{user.name}
) }
); } export default FriendsList;
